message.content:
cs.IT, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.CC

Reasoning: The paper uses an information-theoretic approach to bounded rationality, which suggests a strong connection to the field of information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses decision-making processes, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of the Blahut-Arimoto algorithm and simulations suggest a focus on machine learning and optimization (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the convergence of the update rule, which suggests a focus on control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper discusses the avoidance of infeasible operations, which suggests a focus on computational complexity (cs.CC).
